snippet: On a path to becoming a major cultural force downtown, Trinity Church blinks, announcing it would explore “additional funding sources and programming options.”
abstract: James R Oestreich Critic's Notebook holds that the recent decision by Trinity Church to put its program of afternoon concerts on hiatus while it explores additional funding sources and programming options casts doubt on its future as a major cultural center for the financial district.
lead_paragraph: On a path to becoming a major cultural force downtown, Trinity Church blinks, announcing it would explore “additional funding sources and programming options.”

headline.seo: Trinity Church, a Sanctuary for Music, Cuts Back
headline.main: Churchly Sanctuary for Music Cuts Back
headline.print_headline: Churchly Sanctuary For Music Cuts Back
